text: Looks like I'm going in alone. Heh, just like the old days.
Alright {party[1].name}, just the two of us. Let's move out.
Alright team, sound off. We're moving out.

Leaving the eerie silence of the station behind, Commander with his bravery, walks past the train station and enters the forest. A chasm of jagged rock and swirling fog marks the entrance. The air grows cold.

Let me check the God Cube detector.
Seems like its reading remains accurate, it even is growing stronger.
Unfortunately, the Commander did not hear the voice.
